text: She had dreaded his outpourings of affection for her in poetry that he thought would to write on ever more daring themes, teaching the world to guess what repentance and unrepentance preyed upon his thoughts.
handwritten_text: She had dreaded his outpourings of affection for her in poetry that he thought would to write on ever more daring themes, teaching the world to guess what repentance and unrepentance preyed upon his thoughts.
